name: Maths Buddy
description:
Numbers can be fun you can play around with for a sharper memory and IQ. Funbrain is a fun mathematical game that gives you a portal of learning math by solving mathematical equations. Wow!

It doesn’t matter whether you’re a child or an adult, as you are exposed to equation after equation, test your ability to add, subtract, multiply and divide – and speed against the clock! (Note: Do NOT use a calculator! That’s cheating!)

Who thought math could be of so much fun? Well in this game you can achieve so much more than just passing time. It’s a puzzle-oriented mind-sharpening game that not only provides fun with numbers but also a great enhancement of learning for the kids through sum, subtraction, division and multiplication equations.

Plug in the missing numbers to complete mathematical equations correctly, and you will be on your way to finding your mathematical genius! (Just show people all the certificates you collect from Funbrain and ask them to try and beat your scores!)
